alert.note: Alert for Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 7:07PM CDT until April 20 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN COOK COUNTY... At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Roseland, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Cicero, Hammond, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Calumet City, West Town, Chicago Lawn, Englewood, South Shore, Roseland, Lincoln Park, Bridgeport, Chicago Loop, South Lawndale, Lake View, Midway Airport and Austin. This includes... Lincoln Park Zoo, SeatGeek Stadium, University of Chicago, Windy City Thunderbolts Baseball, Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre, Hawthorne Park, Soldier Field, University of Illinois Chicago, Guaranteed Rate Field...IL Institute of Technology, Wrigley Field, The Loop, Museum of Science and Industry, Museum Campus, and Northerly Island. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 283 and 294. I-57 between mile markers 343 and 358. I-80 between mile markers 150 and 155. I-90 between mile markers 101 and 107. I-94 between mile markers 48 and 70. I-290 between mile markers 25 and 29. I-294 between mile markers 48 and 70. Indiana I-90 between mile markers 1 and 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
